name: Arizona PBS Kids Resource Fair
description:
Welcome to the Arizona PBS Kids Virtual Resource Fair, supported by First Things First Arizona! This experience is an exciting way to share the mission of PBS and our resources. Just use the arrow keys to move around, space to jump, and the mouse to interact!

Click on a flyer, logo or video to launch it in a new tab. Check out the informational videos, activities with kids, and more.

Tip: If the cursor is not aligned with the center of the screen, try hitting Esc until it becomes visible, moving the mouse to the center, and clicking to reset it.
